title: PVP Duels
briefDescription: Want to have a 1v1 match with your friends? You've come to the right place. This map is a 1v1 PVP map with 4 different modes, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Want to have a 1v1 match with your friends? You?ve come to the right place. This map is a 1v1 PVP map with 4 different modes, to keep you from being bored. This project has automatic winner detection among other new features.
Lobby

You will see two entrances. To start a fight, one player stand on one entrance pressure plate and the other stand on the other entrance pressure plate.
Duel types avaliable
There are four modes
? NoDebuff
Classic PVP with ender pearls and lots of healing potions.
? Gapple
Classic PVP but with enchanted apples. You only get 16 of them because enchanted apples are too overpowered.
? BuildUHC
Possibly the first type of PVP ever invented. The classic fight experience becomes asymmetrical with building, buckets, bows and fishing rods.
? BowPVP
You are only allowed to use the bow to fight. You are allowed to build defense structures with the blocks given, though.
For the BuildUHC and BowPVP modes, blocks are given. This map shows where you are allowed to place them. (These markings are not in the real map.)
You can choose the type of duel to be done through this panel in the lobby.
The off-limits area. (Look at the amount of commands!)

title: Breaker VS Runner ? MAJOR UPDATE!
briefDescription: Breaker VS Runner is a fun little minigame map made by EatNYeet, PointFixed, and magicexplosion9. So if you're looking for a little uncommon minigame of ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Breaker VS Runner is a fun little minigame map made by EatNYeet, PointFixed, and magicexplosion9. So if you?re looking for a little uncommon minigame of its own concept, this is for you!
Breaker VS Runner is a map with 2 roles: Breaker and Runner. The Breaker?s goal is to make the runner fall, whether it?s by punching them into surrounding lava or breaking the bedrock near the Runner. You may hit the Runner off, or you may break the blocks beneath their feet. The fun part about being the Breaker? You get to be invisible! So not only are you attempting to kill all Runners, you get to troll them in almost every way you can imagine! I admit, it?s kind of like The Floor Is Lava, but it?s still pretty fun with the stopwatch and the effects!
The Runner?s role is self-explanatory, but to sum it up, you pretty much just avoid death. Not enough description for you? Well, the Runner gets Speed and Jump Boost 10 to help them! Be careful, though. They can be both a blessing and a curse. There is also a stopwatch in seconds (Your XP bar) for each individual Runner so that you can compare times alive as well! See who?s better at surviving!
Once you die as a Runner, you get sent to the spectating area! You can spectate the rest of the match and watch your other friends struggle to avoid falling off, maybe even see them do some cool tricks or see hilarious deaths! Almost anything goes!
Bored with the map? Well, grab some more friends! This map will support as many players as Minecraft allows! Want a small twist? Have multiple Breakers and less Runners! It makes for good fun. ? Also, please note that sadly, yes, breakers are actually able to break the map, so please don?t do it! It ruins the game for everyone. There?s nothing to see outside of the map. Also, please note that I use a texture pack, so you may not get the exact same results as I did when taking screenshots.
Arena
Bottom of the map

title: ONE IN THE CHAMBER
briefDescription: One in the Chamber in a classic game best known from Call of Duty and other shooter games. Now, it's in Minecraft! In this map ...

crawledImageUrls.text: One in the Chamber in a classic game best known from Call of Duty and other shooter games. Now, it?s in Minecraft! In this map you have a ONESHOT bow, which can kill a player in a single shot, but you only get one arrow, so use it wisely! You also get a stone sword to use once you have used the arrow. So don?t worry (too much) if you miss your shot.

title: Black Lake Camp (Hide & Seek)
briefDescription: Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the seeker. The seeker is released is 1 minute after the game starts. The seeker?s mission is to kill all the hiders, if you really want you can set your own timer and when that timer ends the players that are left over have won.
Screenshots:

There Are 7 Different Places To Hide:
1. Cave
2. Camp Site
3. Camp Fire
4. Toilet
5. Forest
6. House
7. Lake

title: Void | TheBridge (1v1 ? 2v2 ? 3v3 ? 4v4) [MiniGame]
briefDescription: This map is a TheBridge Minigame map inspired by Hypixel Network (TheBridge Duels). But, This map is based on 2 teams limited to MIN: 1 Player per ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map is a TheBridge Minigame map inspired by Hypixel Network (TheBridge Duels). But, This map is based on 2 teams limited to MIN: 1 Player per team and MAX: 4+ Players per team.
The objective of The Bridge is to cross the 1-block-wide bridge from your base to your opponent?s base and jump in their portal to score a goal. Each time a teammate jumps into the opposing team?s portal, your team scores a point and all players are re-spawned at the starting gates. Note that the map does not reset each round, all the blocks that you build will stay on the map until the end of the game! The first team to score 4 goals wins.
SCORE GOALS
DEFEND YOUR GOAL
CLUTCH IF YOU FALL

title: Jockeys Showdown 1V1 [PvP]
briefDescription: This time I made a PvP map! But, it's a special one! Because you will be riding a Strider the whole fight! If you try ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This time I made a PvP map! But, it?s a special one! Because you will be riding a Strider the whole fight! If you try to get off your strider, you will be transformed into a burnt steak by the lava below you!
Short Information about the map:
This is a 2-player map. Although you can still play this map with 3 or more players, but it will be too crowded since the battle arena is very small, designed only for 1 VS 1 PvP game.
Each player will receive a stone sword, and a bow with 5 arrows, protected by a full set of iron armor. Each player will fight to their death while riding a Strider the whole game! Note that the Striders are immortal, and cannot be controlled, so you have to navigate and move from one Strider to another, so you can dodge your opponent?s attacks! More information are in the map.

title: 7 Minigames For Pvp Practice
briefDescription: Channel:ChannelThis map focuses on improvising many aspects of PvP, including, aim (For both the bow & sword), cps, inventory efficiency, & the ability to change slots ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Channel:
Channel
This map focuses on improvising many aspects of PvP, including, aim (For both the bow & sword), cps, inventory efficiency, & the ability to change slots quickly & accurately.
This can be seen through 7 Minigames
? Cps counter
? Aim practice for sword
? Aim practice for bow
? 1 Player Pvp practice (mob duel with options)
? 2 Player Pvp practice (1v1 Arena)
? Practice looting chests as fast as possible
? Practice switching items in Hotbar as fast as possible
This will help improve yourself in countless Minigames like: Skywars, BedWars, Duels etc?
? This will close to accurately count your cps. What you will do is click the button to the right & then a stick will appear in the item frame in the middle. Click the stick as fast as possible

? Aim practice, a silverfish will randomly spawn on this wall & once you kill it it will randomly find a different place on this wall. The more you practice killing the silverfish, the more accurate in aim you will become

? The minecarts will travel in 2 speeds, ?Sprinting? & ?staggered? movement. You also have an option to be in a minecarts itself. This sikulates aiming the bow at a moving target, while moving yourself.
? For this, you can fight 8 different mobs with 11 different setting options, which totals 48 different combinations for the settings.

? First picture: All the different kits
? Second picture: Put items you want into the chest, & then press the button, giving you a custom kit
? Third picture: The 1v1 Arena
? This minigame will help you loot chests as fast as possible by giving a randomized chest to practice looting.

title: Guardians
briefDescription: Welcome to Guardians. It's a PvP boss fight, where one person is chosen as a Guardian and the rest are Knights. The Knights must team ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to Guardians. It?s a PvP boss fight, where one person is chosen as a Guardian and the rest are Knights. The Knights must team up against the Guardian, while the Guardian uses their wit, strength, and surroundings to finish off the Knights. It?s like Juggernaut, but with more interesting gameplay.
Reminder: Please do not turn the items I the map selection as it will break the selection process.
If you have any recommendations, questions, or class balances, please tell me in the comments.
There are 5 arenas to choose from: Classic Plains, Lava Laconicum, Whaling Waters, Traps n? Tools, and Demolition Desert. In each arena, there is a Guardian class that suits it best. There are currently 10 Guardian classes and 10 Knight classes. The Guardian is gifted with a special ability to aid them in battle, ranging from homing fire missiles to charged creeper fireworks. More information on each Guardian class is located in the lectern when chosen as the Guardian. ???????

title: TheTower
briefDescription: In addition to the two camps, the map is made up of 3 very interesting towers located right in the middle, between the bases. On the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In addition to the two camps, the map is made up of 3 very interesting towers located right in the middle, between the bases. On the central tower is at its top a beacon to bring back and put at home while, on the opposite towers spawn iron ingots and lapis lazuli: practical for your armor and your enchantments! The endless battle for control of the ?mid? can begin
Presentation: The Towers is a map created by DragonNoirFRYtB whose concept is quite simple: your objective will be to enter the opposing camp and score points by breaking the glass block and throwing yourself into a kind of pool located in the heart of the enemy base. The first team to score 3 points wins the game!
You can use crafts.
You can place and destroy as many blocks as you want.
You can loot enemy chests, but not destroy them.
You will find minecarts at TNT, you are prohibited from destroying opposing chests with them.
Our little tips:
According to the author, the map is made for teams of 3 to 5 players.
Iron armor will be very useful for offense as well as defense: think about it!
For the attack:
Quick attacks on their own as bait can occupy a few opponents while other teammates pass.
Kamikaze attacks will only be effective if you take something away from the opposing team: eat their apples, drink their potions, loot their chests ?
Only take the important stuff when you think it is necessary! You only have one chance with it.
If you feel like you?re going to die, throw yourself into the void rather than giving your opponent free stuff.
For the defense:
Protect your pool by surrounding it with blocks, by solidifying its roof ? Make it difficult to access by laying slabs underneath, by removing the stairs that lead to it ?
If you get to the middle first, try to protect the latter as much as possible with blocks (preferably wood), to delay the opposing team.
In order to prevent theft in your safe room as much as possible, break the glass and completely isolate the room with blocks: only one entry / exit!

title: Murder Mystery
briefDescription: There is a murderer on the loose and its up to you to find out who it is and bring them to justice! You can ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
There is a murderer on the loose and its up to you to find out who it is and bring them to justice! You can be a detective and solve the mystery of the murderer. Or you can play as an innocent and run from the murderer. You can play with up to 8 people to find out who it is!
You are placed in a building and one person is a murderer, another is a detective, and the rest are the innocents.
The murderer has 10 minutes to kill everyone. The murderer is given only a sword.
The detective?s goal is to find and kill the murderer. The detective is given 2 golden apples and an infinity bow.
The others are innocents must survive the murderer. They are give 2 golden apples. They can become the new detective when the old one is killed.
There are 9 differently themed rooms throughout the building to explore. You can look around and find many ways to sneak around and hide.
If you can hunt down the murderer then the innocents and the detective win! Also, if the murderer doesn?t eliminate everyone in the 10 minutes, then the innocents win as well. However, if the murderer kills everyone, then the murderer wins.
Some of the hiding spots include: an underground tunnel that transports you to different rooms, there is a room where you can hide behind a bunch of doors, one has tons of bamboo to hide in.

Gold can spawn randomly throughout the map. When you collect enough gold, you can purchase items that will help you against the opponent.
For 10 Gold you can purchase a shield
For 15 Gold you can purchase a speed potion
For 25 Gold you can purchase a healing II potion
The murderer and detective are chosen at random. And the game is continuous, so everyone will have a chance to become the person in each position.
Players: 3-8
Subscribe to Swaggy Cat: https://www.youtube.com/swaggycat
More Images:
